sourcesContent:
import React, { useMemo, useState } from "react"; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from "./ui/card"; import { Badge } from "./ui/badge"; import { Button } from "./ui/button"; import { Camera, Activity, AlertTriangle, Clock, TrendingUp, TrendingDown, Eye, MapPin, ChevronRight, ShieldCheck, AlertOctagon, ChevronLeft, } from "lucide-react"; import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableHeader, TableRow } from "./ui/table"; // Datos para las tarjetas de indicadores clave (KPI) const kpiData = [ { title: "Cámaras Registradas", value: "24", subtitle: "+2 esta semana", change: "+8.3%", trend: "up", icon: Camera, color: "text-primary", bgColor: "bg-primary/10", }, { title: "Cámaras Activas", value: "18", subtitle: "6 inactivas", change: "75%", trend: "neutral", icon: Activity, color: "text-emerald-600", bgColor: "bg-emerald-500/10", }, { title: "Incidentes Hoy", value: "7", subtitle: "-3 vs ayer", change: "-30%", trend: "down", icon: AlertTriangle, color: "text-amber-600", bgColor: "bg-amber-500/10", }, { title: "Última Alerta", value: "5 min", subtitle: "CAM-001", change: "Reciente", trend: "neutral", icon: Clock, color: "text-destructive", bgColor: "bg-destructive/10", }, ]; // Datos para la tabla de actividad reciente const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, weaponType: "Pistola", confidence: 0.94, camera: "CAM-001", cameraName: "Entrada Principal", location: "Edificio A - Piso 1", timestamp: "14:32:15", date: "09/02/2026", severity: "high" }, { id: 2, weaponType: "Rifle", confidence: 0.87, camera: "CAM-005", cameraName: "Estacionamiento", location: "Zona Externa", timestamp: "13:18:42", date: "09/02/2026", severity: "critical" }, { id: 3, weaponType: "Cuchillo", confidence: 0.76, camera: "CAM-012", cameraName: "Pasillo Norte", location: "Edificio B - Piso 2", timestamp: "12:05:28", date: "09/02/2026", severity: "medium" }, { id: 4, weaponType: "Pistola", confidence: 0.91, camera: "CAM-003", cameraName: "Recepción", location: "Edificio A - Planta Baja", timestamp: "11:44:11", date: "09/02/2026", severity: "high" }, { id: 5, weaponType: "Objeto Sospechoso", confidence: 0.68, camera: "CAM-008", cameraName: "Salida Trasera", location: "Zona Externa", timestamp: "10:22:33", date: "09/02/2026", severity: "low" }, ]; export function Dashboard() { // ✅ PAGINACIÓN const pageSize = 10; const [page, setPage] = useState(1); const totalPages = Math.max(1, Math.ceil(recentActivity.length / pageSize)); const pageData = useMemo(() => { const start = (page - 1) * pageSize; return recentActivity.slice(start, start + pageSize); }, [page]); const canPrev = page > 1; const canNext = page < totalPages; const goPrev = () => setPage((p) => Math.max(1, p - 1)); const goNext = () => setPage((p) => Math.min(totalPages, p + 1)); return (

)}
